name: Madurai Sumdali
description: Adorn your Landing Craft with the Madurai cloud.

languages.description: Schmücke dein Landungsschiff mit der Madurai-Wolke.
languages.name: Sumdali: Madurai

languages.description: Décorez votre Vaisseau de Débarquement avec le nuage Madurai.
languages.name: Sumdali Madurai

languages.description: Decora la tua Navicella con la nuvola Madurai.
languages.name: Sumdali Madurai

languages.description: Decora tu nave de desembarco con la nube Madurai.
languages.name: Sumdali Madurai

languages.description: 通过 Madurai 之云装饰你的登陆艇。
languages.name: Madurai 船徽

languages.description: ランディングクラフトにMadurai雲を飾ろう。
languages.name: Madurai サムダリー

languages.description: Ozdób swój Statek desantowy chmurą Madurai.
languages.name: Sumdali Madurai

languages.description: Enfeite sua Nave de Pouso com a nuvem da Escola Madurai.
languages.name: Sumdali da Madurai

languages.description: 透過 Madurai 雲來點綴你的登陸艇。
languages.name: Madurai 船標

languages.description: ตกแต่งยานลงจอดของคุณด้วยกลุ่มหมอก Madurai
languages.name: Madurai Sumdali

languages.description: Çıkarma Gemini Madurai bulutu ile süsle.
languages.name: Madurai Sumdali
